shell.disclaimer: This application is not affiliated with miHoYo Limited.

referenceServer.label: Reference Server
referenceServer.description: Select Genshin Game Server used for timer resets.

inAppNotification.label: In-App Notification
inAppNotification.description: Whether to display in-page notification. This does not triggers OS/browser notification.

browserNotification.label: Browser Notification
browserNotification.description: Whether to display OS/browser notification using Notifications API.
browserNotification.notSupported: Your browser does not support Notifications API.
browserNotification.denied: Access to Notifications API was rejected.

language.label: Language
language.description: Choose a language to use in UI. Some may partially lack translations.

wakeLock.label: Screen Lock
wakeLock.description: Prevent your device from dimming or locking the screen while this application is running. Will be released when the tab is closed, hidden, or reloaded.
wakeLock.checking: Checking whether your browser supports WakeLock API...
wakeLock.notSupported: Your browser does not support WakeLock API.

feedbackVibration.label: Feedback Vibration
feedbackVibration.description: When turned on, the device perform short feedback vibration for primary actions. On devices without vibration mechanism, this setting has no effect.
feedbackVibration.notSupported: Your browser does not support Vibration API.

randomEventCounterPage.title: Random event counter
randomEventCounterPage.description: Log and Manage how many times left you can get a reward by completing a random event/quest.
randomEventCounterPage.noMoreLeft: You claimed all rewards you have today

timerPage.title: Timer
timerPage.description: Setup timers for parameteric transformer, investigation points, etc. You can optionally enable push notification on config page.

empty.title: No timers created
empty.description: Let's create a timer to use your resouces efficiently.

day.label: Days
day.description: How long will the timer run, in days?

hour.label: Hours
hour.description: How long will the timer run, in hours?

minute.label: Minutes
minute.description: How long will the timer run, in minutes?

validation.gte: %s must be greater than or equal to %s.
